shri lankeya sinama salakuna nawatha warak jathyantharayata gena yamin, ehi abhimanaya sanituhan karamin, 2013 niwyok siti jathyanthara chithrapata ulele hondama naluwata himi sammanaya dina gath, 'samige kathawa' sinama siththama, ada (pebarawari masa 28 wanida sikurada) sita diwayina pura pihiti 'si.ee.el' mandalaye sinama shalawanhidi pradarshanaya arambae.

"wyawasthawa" kiyana wachanayata wada othanata sudusu "deshapalanaya" kiyana wachanaya.ee koyi hati wunath widhayakaya ahosi karana nawa wyawasthawak genna me kisiwekuta awashya nathi bawa pahadiliyi.idiripath wenne naha kiwwata janadhipathi 2020 janadhipathiwaranayata idiripath wenawa.ekata thamayi oya dilan.mahinda amarawira,wijith wijithamunila ehema kasakarayo wage enne.

yata giya dawasa miyulu nuwara andgathi nam rajek wiya.....[sanskaranaya] yata giya dawasa miyulu nuwara andgathi nam rajek wiya, ohuge ruja nam wu pri yawu suwak atha, oo manognyawu ru aththi ya, sukshama wu nuwana aththi ya, achala wu shramadha aththi ya, thudus jathiyak danna jathismarana gnyana aththi ya, ee raja dawas patha paswisi karanduwak suwanda mal ha suwanda palandana duwata deyi, madi pohoyen pohoyata dan denu sandaha dahasin banda piyali da deyi, theme da dahamen semen rajakereyi.
ese wennata aththe mage lokaya pululwima saha mama wayasin muhukura yama nisane.

bohoma sthuthiyi agayima pilibandawa. 2012 juni 20 dina 13:02 ta man biyugal wadanayak ahala thiyenawa paralimenthuwa asala ranawiru smarakayedi,oba thumage lipiye hatiyata hawasa 6 ta wenna oone eka wadanaya karanne,tikak dukbara thalayak thiyena wadanayak..

sali mahatha eksath jathika pakshikayaku lesa sita janadhipathiwarayage dath shakthimath kirima sandaha aanduwata ekathuwuweki.
eheth eyin kiyanne naha jathika sanwidhana siyalla ee mathaye siti bawa
nibandawa ese niwaradi disawata apa yomu wanawa yanu niwaradi drushtiyakata paminiya yuthuyi.

adisham mandiraye thiyena pradhanathama angayak thamayi thomas mahathage ruwa sahitha chithraya.dewid pentar kiyana ingrisi jathikaya thamayi me pinthure adala thiyenne.dawinchige monalisa chithraya wagema me pinthureth api yana dihawata harenawa.ee wunata monalisa chithrayata wada suwisheshi bhawayak me chithraye thiyenawa.a thamayime chithraye as witharak neweyi,mulu pudgalayama yana yana athata harenawa.eewata amatharawa thawath chithra 16k mehi surakshithawa thanpath karala thiyenawa.
ee naduwa oppu kirimata pramanawath sakki nathi bawa kiyamini.
aayurwedaya ho aayurweda waidya widyawa yanu indiyanu upa mahadwipayata aawenika pauranika waidya kramayaki.
samaharu boru waradi kiya apiwa hara yathi.

niyojya amathya palitha thewarapperuma anuradhapura galenbindunu wawa pradeshayata yamin sitiyadi galewela pradeshayedi ada perawaru 11ta pamana mema siduwima daka galewela pradeshiya rohala wetha gos thibenawa.

lohichchaya, yamse daksha kumbaalek ho kumbaalakhuge athawassek ho monawata piriyam kala (=sakas kala) matten yam yam bhajana wisheshayak kamaththe nam, ee ee daya ma karanne da, monawata nipadawanne da- lohichchaya, yamse daksha danthakarayek (athdath aadi yen wisithuru kam karannek) ho danthakarayakuge athawassek ho monawata piriyam kala (=dos iwath kota monawata sakas kala)dathekhi yam yam danthawikruthiyath (dathehi kala wisithuru rupadiyak) kamathi wanne nam, ee ee daya ma karanne da, wesesin nipadawanne - lohichchaya, yamse ho daksha rankaruwek ho rankaruwekuge athawassek ho monawata sakas kala ranehi yam yama swarna wikruththiyak (aabharana aadiyak) kamaththe nam, ee ee daya ma karanne da , nipadawanne da, lohichchaya, eparidden ma mahana theme mese samahitha wu sitha pirisidu wu kalhi, dipthimath wu kalhi keles rahitha wu kalhi, upakleshayan paha wa giya kalhi, mrudu wu kalhi, sruddhiwidhagnyanaya pinisa sitha meheyawayi nambauru kereyi.
